data.name: Nonno Lorenzo
data.detailed_description:
Nonno Lorenzo is an exploration driven farming and cooking RPG where you run your own pizzeria!

The village got shrouded in darkness after the pizzaiolo left and it's now up to you to bring happiness back to the island. With an old farm at disposal, you must grow ingredients, upgrade equipment, gain new skills and explore the world to make the village what it once was. Can you make the village a sprawling happy community again?

Features



  • Skills | Level up six different skills to improve Lorenzo's abilities!
  • Farming | Plant seeds that grow into ingredients!
  • Pizzeria | Own your very own pizzeria, obtain furniture and customize it to your liking!
  • Pizza Making | Make pizza dough and top with whatever toppings you can obtain!
  • Orders | Receive orders from the village residents, figure out their likes and dislikes to increase their happiness!
  • Exploration | Explore a fantasy island with multiple biomes and points of interest!
  • Villagers | Get to know the town residents through handcrafted dialogue!
  • Quests | Complete both handcrafted- and randomly generated quests
  • Village | Do orders and help lost villagers to make the village happy once again. See the village market come alive

data.short_description: Farm, cook, explore and level up in Nonno Lorenzo! An exploration driven farming and cooking RPG where you run your own pizzeria. With an old farm at disposal, you must grow ingredients, level up and explore the island to make it the happy community it once was.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5 Processor or greater
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.13+
  • Processor: Intel i5 Processor or greater
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel or AMD GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04+
  • Processor: Intel i5 Processor or greater
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660 or greater | OpenGL 3.2+
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
